properties.title: Java date and time API - Tasks outstanding
properties.author: Stephen Colebourne

section.name: Tasks outstanding
section.p: The following tasks are on the possible TODO list - contact the mailing lists for more details:

ul.li: Add more chronologies - Ethiopian, Hebrew, Islamic, Persian, Hindu, Thai, Chinese, Japanese,...
Consider methods to easily get to the last day in a month
Consider allowing the text output to be altered
ChronologyType to better represent chronologies in partials (no time zone)
Date matching methods to find next date matching search criteria
